Module: CGroup.hpp Description: CGroup class for handling PtGroup widgets

Member Function Documentation

CGroup::STANDARD_CONSTRUCTORS ( CGroup ) [pure virtual]
 

Reimplemented in CDivider, and CMenu.

int CGroup::setEqualSizeOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setEqualSizeOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isEqualSize ( )
 

If on, forces all children to be the same height and width

int CGroup::setExclusiveSelectOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setExclusiveSelectOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isExclusiveSelect ( )
 

If on, only one child can be selected at a time. This is usually used for radio buttons: A group is created with setExclusiveSelectOn, and all toggle buttons that are children of this group behave like radio buttons

int CGroup::setNoSelectAllowedOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setNoSelectAllowedOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isNoSelectAllowed ( )
 

if on, allow any exclusive group to have no selected item. If this flag is set, the user can deselect the currently selected child without having to select another child. To do this, the user simply clicks on the currently selected child.

int CGroup::enableKeys ( )
 

All keys are enabled for the group

int CGroup::disableKeys ( )
 

Prevent the group from using any keys (e.g. arrows)

int CGroup::disableWrapKeys ( )
 

Don't use keys that would cause horizontal or vertical wrap

int CGroup::disableHorizontalWrapKeys ( )
 

Don't use keys that would cause horizontal wrap

int CGroup::disableVerticalWrapKeys ( )
 

Don't use keys that would cause vertical wrap

int CGroup::setEqualSizeHorizontalOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setEqualSizeHorizontalOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isEqualSizeHorizontal ( )
 

If on, makes all children in the group the width of the widest one

int CGroup::setEqualSizeVerticalOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setEqualSizeVerticalOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isEqualSizeVertical ( )
 

If on, makes all children in the group the height of the tallest one

int CGroup::setStretchHorizontalOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setStretchHorizontalOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isStretchHorizontal ( )
 

If on, stretches the right column of widgets as the group expands

int CGroup::setStretchVerticalOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setStretchVerticalOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isStretchVertical ( )
 

If on, stretches the bottom row of widgets as the group expands

int CGroup::setStretchHorizontalAndVerticalOn ( )
 

If on, stretches the right column and the bottom row as the group expands

int CGroup::setStretchFillOn ( )
 

int CGroup::setStretchFillOff ( )
 

int CGroup::isStretchFill ( )
 

If on, stretches the last widgets to fill the available space in the direction indicated by the orientation

int CGroup::setHorizontalOrientation ( )
 

Align the children horizontally

int CGroup::setVerticalOrientation ( )
 

Align the children vertically

int CGroup::setOrientationOff ( )
 

Don't align the children

int CGroup::setSpacing ( int spacing )
 

int CGroup::setSpacing ( int horizonalSpacing,
int verticalSpacing )
 

int CGroup::setHorizontalSpacing ( int horizontalSpacing )
 

int CGroup::setVerticalSpacing ( int verticalSpacing )
 

If alignment is in effect, these resources define how many pixels will separate each child of the group horizontally and vertically. setGroupSpacing sets x and y spacing to the same value

int CGroup::setHorizontalAlignLeft ( )
 

int CGroup::setHorizontalAlignCenter ( )
 

int CGroup::setHorizontalAlignRight ( )
 

Determines how the children are aligned within the group. The children retain their relative positions to each other.

int CGroup::setVerticalAlignTop ( )
 

int CGroup::setVerticalAlignCenter ( )
 

int CGroup::setVerticalAlignBottom ( )
 

Determines how the children are aligned within the group. The children retain their relative positions to each other.

int CGroup::setAlignCenter ( )
 

Sets horizontal and vertical alignment to center

int CGroup::setRowsCols ( int rowsCols )
 

For a horizontally aligned group, this resource indicates the number of columns to distribute children into. For a vertically aligned group, this resource indicates the number of rows to distribute children into. Not used for an "as is" group; see setGroupOrientation, above.
